### Load data [Ingest]

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/gender-disparity-kuwait/gender-uganda.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Plot [ Views / Temporals ]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide',  fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 20, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 15),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 10),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    #panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position='top'
  )

v1 <- ggplot(df)+
  geom_line(aes(x=Year, y= M_Pop), colour= "#2da9d9", size = 1)+
  geom_line(aes(x=Year, y= F_Pop), colour= "#b73377", size = 1)+
  geom_ribbon(aes(x=Year, ymin= F_Pop, ymax = M_Pop), alpha = 0.3, fill = "#ff99cd")+
   annotate("text", x = 2010, y = 15500000, label = "Male Population", angle = 25, size = 4, colour= "#2da9d9")+
   annotate("text", x = 2006, y = 15000000, label = "Female Population", angle = 25, size = 4, colour= "#b73377")+
  annotate("text", x = 2017, y = 18000000, label = "Gender Imbalance\nnot Very Large", size = 5, fontface = 2, colour = "#b73377")+
  labs(title = "Gender Imbalance (Uganda)",
    subtitle = "Disaparity between Male and Female Population",
    y = "Population",
    x = "Year",
    caption = "Data Source: World Bank")+
  theme_bw() + 
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

ggsave(filename = "assets/kuwait-gender-imbalance.svg", plot = v1, width=16, height=9)

```
